entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Collins Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collins Bay 8:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -27.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -30.9°C
Wind: NW 21 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
